name: NORTH AMERICAN SOCIETY FOR PEDIATRIC GASTROENTEROLOGY, HEPATOLOGY AND NUTRITION

sampleDescriptions: Legislation to require coverage of medically necessary foods for disease and disorders of the gastrointestinal system in pediatric patients. Coverage mandate would apply to Medicaid, Medicare, Childre
